dcterms:creator: S. Garcia
M. Grill
J. Stiborek
A. Zunino
dcterms:description: CTU-13 dataset widely used in the studies of botnet detection. In this dataset, a botnet scenario is a particular infection of the virtual machines using a specific malware. Thirteen of these scenarios were created, and each of them was designed to be representative of some malware behavior.
dcterms:title: CTU-13

dcterms:description: A network monitoring dataset collected using a Zeek server connected at the network border. The dataset is not labeled.
dcterms:title: Dataset K
